findings.title: Redundant Code
findings.description: The following code contains redundant parts.

findings.title: Validator refresh failure risk
findings.description: If the dev address is the contract address and does not have the function of receiving payment or refuses to receive payment, will cause the _refreshValidators_ function to fail.

findings.title: Cannot register after deletion
findings.description: In the Nodes contract, after calling the _unreg_ function, the node address cannot call the _reg_ function again because nodeAdded has been set to true.

findings.title: _refreshValidators_ function failure
findings.description: If the dev address is the contract address and does not have the function of receiving payment or refuses to receive payment, will cause the _refreshValidators_ function to fail.

findings.title: Node address cannot call _reg_ function again
findings.description: In the Nodes contract, after calling the _unreg_ function, the node address cannot call the _reg_ function again because nodeAdded has been set to true.
